localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Your resume is the most important part of your job search, but also one of the hardest to get right. Rezi makes it easy for you with our AI-powered resume builder that generates perfect resume content for you. TL;DR: Nice
blogPost.body: Your resume is the most important part of your job search, but also one of the hardest to get right. Rezi makes it easy for you with our AI-powered resume builder that generates perfect resume content for you. TL;DR: Nice
blogPost.title: Rezi 3.0 - GPT-3 resume builder
blogPost.author: Jacob Jacquet

localize.description: 您的简历是您求职中最重要的部分，但也是最难做好的部分之一。Rezi通过我们的人工智能驱动的简历生成器，为你生成完美的简历内容，让你轻松搞定。TL;DR: 不错
您的簡歷是您求職中最重要的部分，但也是最難做好的部分之一。Rezi通過我們的人工智能驅動的簡歷生成器，爲你生成完美的簡歷內容，讓你輕鬆搞定。TL;DR: 不錯

previous.excerpt: Rollcall makes it easy to organize remote meetings with people in any timezone. Add to Slack, create an agenda, schedule a timeframe and the Rollcall bot collects your standup in text, audio-only, screen share and video formats.
previous.title: Rollcall - Asynchronous standup meetings in Slack.

localize.description: Rollcall可以让您轻松组织任何时区的远程会议。添加到Slack，创建一个议程，安排一个时间框架，Rollcall机器人以文本，纯音频，屏幕共享和视频格式收集你的摊位。
Rollcall可以讓您輕鬆組織任何時區的遠程會議。添加到Slack，創建一個議程，安排一個時間框架，Rollcall機器人以文本，純音頻，屏幕共享和視頻格式收集你的攤位。

next.excerpt: Polotno Studio is a design editor. Use the large library of photos and vector illustrations to create images for social media, youtube previews, covers, presentations.
next.title: Polotno Studio - Canva-like design editor. No signups, no ads, no paywalls.

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款设计编辑器。使用大量的照片和矢量插图库，为社交媒体、youtube预览、封面、演示文稿创建图像。
localize.tagline: 类似Canva的设计编辑器。没有注册，没有广告，没有付费墙。

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款設計編輯器。使用大量的照片和矢量插圖庫，爲社交媒體、youtube預覽、封面、演示文稿創建圖像。
localize.tagline: 類似Canva的設計編輯器。沒有註冊，沒有廣告，沒有付費牆。
